title: Beautiful 2 bed, 1 bath, 6 room unit, hardwd fls, patio in multi famil
posting_body: ['Spacious unit, living and dining rooms, plus sunroom', 'in multi family just listed.', 'The kitchen has dishwasher', 'and there is basement storage.', '2 bedrooms, hardwood floors, sunroom, 1 bath with cabinet vanity,', 'yard and 1 parking space.', 'Nice yard and patio in unit washer/dryer.', 'Located very convenient to Rt. 95, Rt. 2, shops supermarkets,', 'restaurants, etc.', 'Available 9/1, no pets or smoking allowed.', 'Good credit and monthly income required is approx.', '$6,800.', 'Set up your viewing now.', 'This unit will not last', 'on the market.', 'There is a real estate fee of $2,800.', 'if you rent this unit.', 'Monaco R.E.', 'Newton, MA', '617-974-3019', 'Please reference: 2 bed in Belmont, $2,800 in your text or message']
